CustomField.description: Time since the issue was created
CustomField.formula: IF ( (Now()- CreatedDate) > 0, LPad(TEXT(FLOOR((Now()- CreatedDate))),3,"0") & "d:" & Lpad(TEXT( FLOOR( 24 * ( (Now()- CreatedDate) - FLOOR((Now()- CreatedDate)) ))),3,"0") & "h:" & Lpad(TEXT( ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ( (Now()- CreatedDate) - FLOOR((Now()- CreatedDate)) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ( (Now()- CreatedDate) - FLOOR((Now()- CreatedDate)) ),8)) ),0)),2,"0") & "m" , "")
CustomField.label: Issue Age
